Caption: Prof.K.T. Chandy(Chairman Board of Governors) addressing the audience at the Inauguration of the Computer Centre. From left, Prof.S.Sampath, Prof.A.Ramachandran, Dr. Erhard Eppler(Minister of Cooperation, Federal Republic of Germany), Mr.C.Ramachandran, KAV Pandalai
